name: Mammy Angie
text: Went to the one out side of Minersville Pa. The carry out real right now is amazing! 7.99 for a large 3 topping pizza... Yeah Boy!!! Was an awesome moving day treat that didn't break our bank! Delicious üòã

name: Linda Minnich
text: We ordered the meat lovers pizza and it was delicious! We didn't have to wait very long for it to be ready. We also decided to order the brownies after the pizza was made. While waiting in our vehicle the server brought them out to us along with a bottle of soda I forgot inside. Now that was a service I sure did not expect!

name: Maryanne Alisauckas
text: They have so gone down hill. It used to be a great place to eat. With great pizza and pasta dishes. Too many cut backs have now cut out quality and customers. I'll never go back.

text: I love this place food is great... I order the Veggie Pizza it's wonderful.. They deliver it hot the pastas great. I had back injury the drivers are always kind. Ask how I am doing deliver in the snow..Shout out to Scott really professional... Great all around placeüòÉüòÉ

text: Good luck with take out. 2 weeks in a row my order was wrong because I order pasta and they don‚Äôt make the bread sticks. Both online menu and physical in store menu all state pasta pans come with 5 bread sticks. The kitchen slip doesn‚Äôt print breadsticks so they don‚Äôt make them.

name: Josh Norris
text: Took them 3 tries to get my personal pan pizza right. The first time they straight up didn't even bring it out, the second time it was like a cupcake because it was so under-cooked. And then after i took it back, I waited for 20 minutes for them to even bring it out. Rediculous.

text: On Sunday 3/11/18 we went to Pizza Hut. They were open until 10 pm that night. At 7 pm when we got there, the salad bar was already closed, and the servers stated: ‚Äúwe were cleaning up a little early‚Äù. I didn‚Äôt realize that 3 hours was classified as a little early.
